source.name: Latest Street and Sidewalk Inspection Results Data Since FY07
source.description: Since July 2004, the Controller's Office's City Services Auditor (CSA) Division has worked with the Department of Public Works (DPW) to develop maintenance standards for streets and sidewalks and schedules and inspect for compliance. This data file consolidates street and sidewalk inspection results since FY07. You can also access the file at "Inspection Results Data" section of http://sfcontroller.org/index.aspx?page=49
